body_html: @gunan would it work if the custom op has dependencies on other libraries, such as NCCL, CUDA or MPI? MPI typically comes with "compilation flags" and "linking flags". Also, it is more challenging to run make than gcc/clang from pip install.
body_text: @gunan would it work if the custom op has dependencies on other libraries, such as NCCL, CUDA or MPI? MPI typically comes with "compilation flags" and "linking flags". Also, it is more challenging to run make than gcc/clang from pip install.
body: @gunan would it work if the custom op has dependencies on other libraries, such as NCCL, CUDA or MPI? MPI typically comes with "compilation flags" and "linking flags". Also, it is more challenging to run `make` than `gcc`/`clang` from `pip install`.
